title: We are a Collection of Patterns - Psychotherapy for the MOQ Levels
description:
The levels, inorganic-biological-social-intellectual, operate within us as sub-personalities and each has their needs. MOQ can be viewed as a structural model of personality, and in this context, we create a treatment plan for our patient.

Putnam's book:  https://www.amazon.com/Way-Are-Influence-Identities-Personality/dp/0998083305/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=frank+w+putnam&qid=1611801422&sr=8-1
